page.title: 10The Minister
page.content: The minister moved to Gretna in 1975 from Bishopbriggs,where he had been in the ministry for only four months.Before becoming a minister{ {Bryan}worked on British Rail for five years.The Haston family live in the recently modernised manse at Gretna Green. The minister has four churches in his parish,{Gretna Old,St Andrews,Half {Morton and Kirkpatrick Fleming.}In a year he conducts,on average,15 to 18 marriage ceremonies.In the ten years he has been in Gretna he has conducted 309 funerals. The minister does not think he will be required to move in the near future and feels that he is in a pleasant situation with a friendly and helpful flock.
